The rainbow as the sign of God's covenant with Noah implies
explanation: The rainbow as the sign of God's covenant with Noah symbolizes God's mercy. According to the biblical account in Genesis 9:12-17, God placed the rainbow in the sky as a sign of His covenant with Noah and all living creatures, promising never again to flood the earth and destroy all flesh. The rainbow serves as a reminder of God's mercy and faithfulness to His covenant.
